## Project Summary

ShopList is a React + Vite + Material-UI application for managing a shopping list with categories and progress tracking.

### Key Features
- Interactive checklist with category organization
- Local storage persistence
- Real-time progress indicator
- Modern Material-UI design
- JSON-based data loading

### Technology Stack
- React 18
- Vite (build tool)
- Material-UI v5
- Emotion (styling)

### Current Status
✅ Project fully set up and running on http://localhost:5174
✅ All dependencies installed
✅ Development server active
✅ Shopping list data loaded from JSON
✅ Checkbox functionality with local storage persistence

### Next Steps (Optional)
- Deploy to production (run `npm run build`)
- Customize shopping-list.json with your items
- Add additional features (filters, sorting, etc.)
